short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension aiming to provide features other extensions pay wall

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is possible by running everything locally, so there is no server costs at all.

This extension is also compatible with all the other Roblox extensions.

This is extension is also completely open source.

Features:
A free region selector, so u can select the server closest to you when joining games.
Hidden games viewer, this allows you to view games hidden from a user or groups profile.
Sales / Revenue, this allows you to view sales and revenue stats on specific items.
And more!

Source code: https://github.com/NotValra/RoValra
